menuItems.description: Toast with your choice of two accompaniments [eggs your way, nutella, butter, peanut butter, mixed berry jam, marmalade, marmite]

menuItems.description: Stack of 3 fluffy large pancakes or waffles. Served with maple syrup and whipped butter. With your choice of [lemon and sugar, caramalised bananas and butter scotch, berry compote and whipped cream, rashers and hash stack, garlic mushrooms and fried egg]
menuItems.title: Pancakes OR Waffles

menuItems.description: Creamy garlic mushrooms on toast. Can add a poached or fried egg for $3.00
menuItems.title: Mushrooms on Toast

menuItems.description: Two stuffed cheesy toast with relish and your choice of 3 fillings [spinach, mushrooms, chicken, halloumi, jalapenoes, aoli]
menuItems.title: Cheesy Toast
